snippet.title: Metal Suits: Counter-attack - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Fall Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Check out the latest Metal Suits: Counter-attack trailer to see gameplay, various combat suit abilities, combat, and more from this upcoming 2D sidescrolling action platformer game. In 4373. Kevin was once hailed as a war hero. Now an old and sick veteran, he is living a peaceful old age on a nursing spaceship with his beloved dog 'Andy'. Until the nursing spaceship exploded due to an invasion by the alien "Golida", losing his beloved dog 'Andy' and most of his body. After that, Kevin loses everything and is reborn as a cyborg, beginning to take revenge on Golida, an alien who took everything from him. Metal Suits: Counter-attack will be available on PC and consoles in 2025.
